com.epoch.qBank

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.qBank.Question
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChemConstants, AppConstants, AuthorConstants, FormatConstants, EvalResultConstants, OneEvalConstants, QuestionConstants, SubstnConstants, TranslnConstants, XMLConstants

    public class Question
extends Object
implements AuthorConstants, ChemConstants, EvalResultConstants, OneEvalConstants, QuestionConstants, SubstnConstants, TranslnConstants
    An ACE question, formerly called a problem.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private List<Evaluator> allEvaluators
      All evaluators, simple or complex, for this question.
      private String authorId
      Author of the question; MASTER_AUTHOR for master database questions.
      private String book
      Textbook from which this question derives.
      private String chapter
      Chapter number of the textbook from which this question derives, or the initials of the author of the question if the textbook is "Other".
      private boolean corrupted
      Indicates if question could not properly be downloaded from database.
      private int editType
      Status of a locally authored question (SAME, CHANGED, or NEW).
      private List<Figure> figures
      The question figure or figures; may be empty.
      private String keywords
      Stored but not current used for anything; will eventually be used to sort questions by their characteristics.
      private boolean masterQ
      Indicates if this question is from the master database.
      String miscMessage
      Error message to the author if the question could not be saved.
      private static int[] noInts 
      String origStatement
      A copy of the question statement, used to see if the question statement has changed before keeping/erasing its translations.
      private int phraseId
      ID used for translations of the question statement.
      private List<ArrayList<QDatum>> qData
      Contains two lists of data that apply across evaluators.
      private long qFlags
      Flags of the question.
      private int qId
      Distinguishes this question from all others.
      private int qSetId
      Unique ID of QSet in which this Q resides.
      private int qType
      Type of the question.
      private String remarks
      Number of the question in the chapter and textbook.
      private int serialNo
      Serial number of the question within a set.
      private String statement
      The question statement; may or may not include the common question statement (or header) of the question set to which this question belongs, depending on the database call when the question was loaded.

      • qId

        private final int qId
        Distinguishes this question from all others.

      • qSetId

        private int qSetId
        Unique ID of QSet in which this Q resides.

      • authorId

        private String authorId
        Author of the question; MASTER_AUTHOR for master database questions.

      • qType

        private int qType
        Type of the question.

      • qFlags

        private long qFlags
        Flags of the question.

      • keywords

        private String keywords
        Stored but not current used for anything; will eventually be used to sort questions by their characteristics.

      • statement

        private String statement
        The question statement; may or may not include the common question statement (or header) of the question set to which this question belongs, depending on the database call when the question was loaded.

      • origStatement

        public String origStatement
        A copy of the question statement, used to see if the question statement has changed before keeping/erasing its translations.

      • phraseId

        private int phraseId
        ID used for translations of the question statement.

      • figures

        private final List<Figure> figures
        The question figure or figures; may be empty.

      • qData

        private final List<ArrayList<QDatum>> qData
        Contains two lists of data that apply across evaluators. List 1: permissible starting materials (multistep syntheses questions); items to rank or from which to choose (rank, multiple choice, fill-in-the-blank); table size and captions, preload table (table questions); color of marks (clickable image, draw-vectors); unit names (numeric); constants, initial equations, excluded unit names (equations). List 2: R-group classes from which ACE may choose a specific R group to instantiate a generic R group in the question figure (R-group questions).
        See Also:
        QDatum

      • allEvaluators

        private final List<Evaluator> allEvaluators
        All evaluators, simple or complex, for this question.
        See Also:
        Evaluator

      • book

        private String book
        Textbook from which this question derives.

      • chapter

        private String chapter
        Chapter number of the textbook from which this question derives, or the initials of the author of the question if the textbook is "Other".

      • remarks

        private String remarks
        Number of the question in the chapter and textbook.

      • miscMessage

        public transient String miscMessage
        Error message to the author if the question could not be saved. Also used to store the common Q statement for display in preview.

      • serialNo

        private int serialNo
        Serial number of the question within a set. Used only temporarily in QuestionRead.

      • editType

        private transient int editType
        Status of a locally authored question (SAME, CHANGED, or NEW).

      • corrupted

        private boolean corrupted
        Indicates if question could not properly be downloaded from database.

      • masterQ

        private transient boolean masterQ
        Indicates if this question is from the master database.

      • noInts

        private static final int[] noInts

      • evaluateResponse

        public void evaluateResponse(EvalResult allEvalsResult,
                             Object[] substns)
                      throws ResponseParseException,
                             ResponseFormatException
        Evaluates the response to a question. Called from RegradeSession.doRegrade().
        Parameters:
        allEvalsResult - contains response string from front-end response collector, R groups for instantiation. Modified with feedback, grade, modified response.
        substns - R groups or variable values associated with this user's instance of the question; may be null or empty
        Throws:
        ResponseFormatException - when the response format is incorrect
        ResponseParseException - when the synthesis or mechanism response cannot be parsed or the formula is malformed

      • evaluateResponse

        public void evaluateResponse(EvalResult allEvalsResult,
                             Object[] substns,
                             String[] userLangs,
                             boolean maySeeSynthCalcProds)
                      throws ResponseParseException,
                             ResponseFormatException
        Evaluates the response to a question. Called from HWSession.submitResponse().
        Parameters:
        allEvalsResult - contains response string from front-end response collector, R groups for instantiation. Modified with feedback, grade, modified response.
        substns - R groups or variable values associated with this user's instance of the question; may be null or empty
        userLangs - non-English languages chosen by this user in order of preference
        maySeeSynthCalcProds - whether the user should be permitted to see calculated synthesis products in the feedback
        Throws:
        ResponseFormatException - when the response format is incorrect
        ResponseParseException - when the synthesis or mechanism response cannot be parsed or the formula is malformed

      • parseResponse

        public Response parseResponse(EvalResult allEvalsResult,
                              Object[] substns,
                              String[] userLangs,
                              boolean maySeeSynthCalcProds)
                       throws ResponseParseException,
                              ResponseFormatException
        Parses the response to a question. Called from evaluateResponse() and HWSession.submitResponse().
        Parameters:
        allEvalsResult - contains response string from front-end response collector, R groups for instantiation. Modified with feedback, grade, modified response.
        substns - R groups or variable values associated with this user's instance of the question; may be null or empty
        userLangs - non-English languages chosen by this user in order of preference
        maySeeSynthCalcProds - whether the user should be permitted to see calculated synthesis products in the feedback
        Returns:
        the parsed response
        Throws:
        ResponseFormatException - when the response format is incorrect
        ResponseParseException - when the synthesis or mechanism response cannot be parsed

      • translate

        private String translate(String autoFeedback,
                         String[] userLangs)
        Translates autoFeedback into one of the user's preferred languages.
        Parameters:
        autoFeedback - autoFeedback to translate
        userLangs - languages preferred by the user in order of preference
        Returns:
        translated autoFeedback, or English if no appropriate translation is available

                       String[] userLangs)
        Translates array of autoFeedback into one of the user's preferred languages. Modifies the original.
        Parameters:
        autoFeedback - array of autoFeedback to translate
        userLangs - languages preferred by the user in order of preference

      • translate

        private String translate(OneEvalResult oneEvalResult,
                         String[] userLangs)
        Translates autofeedback into one of the user's preferred languages. May incorporate a variable part into the autofeedback. Variable parts may be substituted for the demarcated part of a phrase or inserted around it; they may be translated or not.
        Parameters:
        oneEvalResult - contains the autofeedback; may also contain variable parts to substitute into it and flags for how to handle them
        userLangs - languages preferred by the user in order of preference
        Returns:
        translated autoFeedback, or English if no appropriate translation is available

      • modifyFailureString

        private void modifyFailureString(OneEvalResult oneEvalResult)
        Modifies the verification failure message to include the row or column caption. This method relies on the message having a format where the word "row" or "column" is followed by a space, a number, and then another space. If any exception is thrown, never mind.
        Parameters:
        oneEvalResult - the OneEvalResult containing the verification error message.
